mapper.update: update worldcup_pk_user set lasttime=now() where openid=#{openid}
mapper.select: select cid,time,result from worldcup_pk_contract_user order by time desc limit 1
select cid,time,result from worldcup_pk_contract_user_group order by time desc limit 1

select u.openid,u.nickname,u.imageUrl,cu.myGuess message from worldcup_pk_user u left join worldcup_pk_contract_user cu on u.openid=cu.uid where cu.cid=#{cid} and u.openid in
#{item}
select openid,nickname,wins,@rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum from worldcup_pk_user p,(select @rownum:=0) q order by wins desc limit 10
select count(openid)+1 from worldcup_pk_user where wins < #{wins}
mapper.update: update worldcup_pk_user set currency=currency+#{num} where openid=#{openid}

update worldcup_pk_user
set currency=currency+#{num},wins=wins+1,all=all+1
set currency=currency-#{num},all=all+1
where openid in
#{item}

update worldcup_pk_user
set currency=currency+#{contractComes.number},wins=wins+1,all=all+1
set currency=currency-#{contractComes.number},all=all+1
where openid = #{contractComes.openId}
